Literature.Title: Influence of the Length and Charge on the Activity of ?-Helical Amphipathic Antimicrobial Peptides.
Literature.Author: Gagnon MC, Strandberg E, Grau-Campistany A, Wadhwani P, Reichert J, Bürck J, Rabanal F, Auger M, Paquin JF, Ulrich AS
